<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="es">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <title>HeyGen Widget</title>
  <style>
    #heygen-widget {
      position: fixed;
      right: 20px;
      bottom: 20px;
      width: 220px;
      height: 220px;
      border-radius: 50%;
      border: none;
      box-shadow: 0px 4px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
      overflow: hidden;
      z-index: 9999;
    }

    @media (max-width: 600px) {
      #heygen-widget {
        width: 90%;
        height: 300px;
        bottom: 10px;
        left: 5%;
        right: 5%;
        border-radius: 12px;
      }
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>
  <iframe
    id="heygen-widget"
    src="https://labs.heygen.com/interactive-avatar/share?"
    frameborder="0"
    allow="microphone"
    allowfullscreen
  ></iframe>
</body>
</html>
